title: The speed of an open car after rain

content.prompt: An open cart on a level surface is rolling without frictional loss through a vertical downpour of rain, as shown above. As the cart rolls, an appreciable amount of rainwater accumulates in the cart. The speed of the cart will

choices.label: increase because of conservation of mechanical energy
decrease because of conservation of mechanical energy
remain the same because the raindrops are falling perpendicular to the direction of the cart's motion

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
